attributes.title: Radiate Enlightenment - Nithyananda's New Year Message for 2010
attributes.description:
http://innerawakening.org/
To experience, live and Radiate Enlightenment - Inner Awakening

A video clip of the 2010 New Year message given by Paramahamsa Nithyananda on January 1 2010. Nithyananda dedicated this year for "Radiating Enlightenment".  He explained that the state of "Jeevan Mukti (living enlightenment) is to be dancing with joy in spite of all problems. Any growth in any department in any civilization is defined by the people who dream in that field. The message called for dreaming the extreme possible dreams about jeevan mukti; so that each one of us can radiate enlightenment through our thoughtless thoughts, through our wordless words, through our actionless actions, through our mind, words and body.
